description.p: This wand has 7 charges for the following properties. It regains 1d6 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn. You also gain +2 to spell attack rolls.
Blessing of Kelemvor. While holding the wand, you can use an action to expend 1 charge to cast ray of enfeeblement without expending a spell slot.
Blessing of Lathander. While holding the wand, you can use an action to expend 1 charge to cast cure wounds at level 2 at a range of 30 feet without expending a spell slot.
